type Menu.MenuItemCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: Represents a collection of objects.

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此類別代表的集合中儲存的物件， ，或。This class represents the collection of objects stored in a , , or . 針對和類別，這個集合代表整個功能表結構的控制項。For the and classes, this collection represents the entire menu structure for the control. 針對類別，這個集合代表與相關聯的子功能表項目清單。For the class, this collection represents the list of submenu items associated with the . 和方法可讓您加入和移除集合中的個別功能表項目。The and methods enable you to add and remove individual menu items from the collection. 您也可以使用方法從集合移除所有功能表項目。You can also use the method to remove all the menu items from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會要求您建立集合關聯的類別衍生自，這類， ，或類別。This class requires that you associate the collection with a class that derives from , such as the , , or class. 因為您必須指定此集合相關聯的功能表，您無法建立多個功能表項目集合和關聯所需的功能表。Since you must specify a menu that is associated with this collection, you cannot create multiple menu item collections and associate them with a menu as needed. 若要切換功能表與相關聯的功能表項目，您必須清除項目的集合，並新增至集合中顯示的功能表項目。In order to switch the menu items associated with a menu, you must clear the collection of items and add the menu items to display to the collection.

span.span: Gets a value indicating the total number of objects in the collection.

value.span: 集合中的 物件數目。

span.span: The number of objects in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Count`屬性會保留數目指派給集合的物件。The `Count` property holds the number of objects assigned to the collection. 您可以使用`Count`上限迴圈來逐一查看集合的屬性值。You can use the `Count` property value as the upper bounds of a loop to iterate through a collection. 請記住，集合的索引值的以零為起始的索引，因此您必須減去一個迴圈的變數。Keep in mind, the index value of a collection is a zero-based index, so you must subtract one from the looping variable. 如果您不會考慮為此，您將會超出上限的集合，並擲回例外狀況。If you do not account for this, you will exceed the upper bounds of the collection and throw an exception. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立主功能表中， `myMainMenu`，與其中一個， `File`，，有三個的子功能表項目： `New`， `Open`，和`Exit`。The following code example shows how to create a main menu, `myMainMenu`, with one , `File`, that has three submenu items: `New`, `Open`, and `Exit`. 使用`Count`屬性，計算中的物件數目`File`功能表，並在訊息方塊中顯示此數字。Using the `Count` property, you count the number of objects in the `File` menu and display this number in a message box. 這個範例需要您已建立名為`Form1`。This example requires that you have already created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[CountProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CountProperty/CPP/countitems.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CountProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CountProperty/CS/countitems.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CountProperty#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/CountProperty/VB/countitems.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果呼叫，最後傳回會檢查索引鍵相符的項目第一次，而且如果沒有相符項目，搜尋會從集合的開頭。If is called successively, the last returned index will be checked for a key match first, and if there is no match, the search starts at the beginning of the collection. 屬性會對應到索引鍵在。The property corresponds to the key for a in the . 索引鍵的比較不區分大小寫。The key comparison is not case-sensitive. 如果`key`參數是`null`或空字串，或沒有相符的項目，會傳回-1。If the `key` parameter is `null` or an empty string, or there are no matches, returns -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當從功能表項目集合，所有後續的功能表項目都會移一個位置，集合中移除。When a is removed from the menu item collection, all subsequent menu items are moved up one position in the collection. 您可以使用這個版本的`Remove`若要移除特定使用的參考，從集合移除。You can use this version of the `Remove` to remove a specific from the collection using a reference to the to be removed. 如果您不需要的參考，您想要移除，您可以使用這個方法可做為參數，接受索引對應到另一個版本移除。If you do not have a reference to the that you want to remove, you can use the other version of this method that accepts, as a parameter, an index corresponding to the to be removed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立主功能表中， `myMainMenu`，具有兩個物件，`File`和`Edit`。The following code example shows how to create a main menu, `myMainMenu`, with two objects, `File` and `Edit`. `File` 功能表有三個的子功能表項目： `New`， `Open`，和`Exit`。The `File` menu has three submenu items: `New`, `Open`, and `Exit`. 使用`Remove`方法，移除`Open`項目從`File`功能表集合。Using the `Remove` method, you remove the `Open` item from the `File` menu collection. 這個範例需要您已建立名為`Form1`。This example requires that you have already created a named `Form1`. [!code-cpp[RemoveMenuItems#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RemoveMenuItems/CPP/removeitems.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RemoveMenuItems#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RemoveMenuItems/CS/removeitems.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RemoveMenuItems#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RemoveMenuItems/VB/removeitems.vb#1)]
